summary: This is an email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney forwarding a document titled 'Epstein Plea001.pdf' to FBI recipients. The email indicates the document relates to Jeffrey Epstein's plea agreement and was transmitted on June 27, 2008.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email subject and attachment reference Epstein's plea agreement, indicating he is the central figure in the legal matter being discussed.

events.title: Transmission of Epstein Plea Document
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney emails a document titled 'Epstein_Plea001.pdf' to FBI recipients, noting the document's poor quality as received.

keyFacts: An email dated June 27, 2008, discusses the transmission of a document related to Jeffrey Epstein's plea agreement.
The document is an attachment titled 'Epstein_Plea001.pdf' forwarded from an Assistant U.S. Attorney to FBI personnel.
The sender notes the document was received in poor quality, suggesting it may have been a fax or scanned copy.
